items.title: Meta hires former Trump advisor Dina Powell McCormick as president and vice chair
items.description: Before joining Meta, Powell McCormick was working as deputy national security advisor to President Donald Trump.

items.description: African defense company Terra comes out of stealth with a $11.75M round led by Joe Lonsdale's 8VC.

items.title: inDrive turns to ads and groceries to diversify revenue
items.description: Advertising on inDrive is being rolled out across its top 20 markets following mid-2025 tests.
